<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

${user_nick}$
(The slate's light is pointing to the Relic of Fog.)

${user_nick}$
Oh well, there's nothing I can do even if I stayed here. I should head to the Relic of Fog.

${user_nick}$
(The slate's light is pointing to the Relic of Fog.)

$Argenta$
Maybe I should have killed all the Ancients when I first met them...
I let my guard down because they could see the Goddess's dreams.

$Argenta$
The Goddess looked something like that. I knew how to transform into this form too...
So I thought they were my allies. How could I have guessed they would stab me in the back like this?!!

$Argenta$
Argh... Hey, you! Spirit or something over there!
(She seems to be looking right at you.)

${user_nick}$
(Spirit? Does she think you're a spirit? Wait, does this mean she can see you?!)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No... I'm not a whisk... (She can't hear you)</html>
<html>Thank goodness you're not calling me a wimp. (She can't hear you)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
I saw you lurking around here for quite a long time. You must be a bored spirit. What was the term humans use to call things like you? Wasp? Wimp? Whisk? ...yeah I think it's whisk.

$Argenta$
Hey there little whisk. Don't you think it's funny? Why didn't the Ancient Dragon warn me of those disgusting Ancients? Didn't he know what they were? He left me with so much information on swords or heraldry, but I don't know much about the humans.

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9416_qu_01.ogg}
The mission that he left for me was to protect Lagendia. I thought they were part of what I needed to protect... was I wrong? If they are not a part of Lagendia, I should have eaten them up to recover my strength.

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9416_qu_02.ogg}
Though I've never talked to the Ancient Dragon directly before, I guess he gave me all the necessary information needed for me to protect this world. If that's so, then the reason why I'm still brooding over this must be... because Ancient Dragon is a shitty dragon.

$Argenta${action:Hwww}
What a mess! According to the knowledge from the Ancient Dragon, my "brother" should be born by now. Where the heck is he?? Do I have to suffer this chaos by myself forever? Irritating!

$Argenta$
At least humans can blame their parents. What can I do? I can't even meet the Ancient Dragon...

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9416_qu_03.ogg}
(Argenta has a frightening twisted look on her face)
...I really wonder what he looks like. If I ever get to meet him, I'll make sure he gets the beating that he deserves.

${user_nick}$
I feel sorry for the Ancient Dragon even though I've never met him before...

$Argenta$
When did I start worrying about these useless things?
(Argenta smiles bitterly)
It must be from the day when I met Arno...

$Arno${action:Talk}
The Goddess drank poison and the Beyond Dragon is attacking our world.
Is there no hope for us?

$Arno$
Has the Ancient Dragon who protects this world succeeded in killing the corrupted Chaos Dragon?
How corrupted did Chaos Dragon become, and how much of a Mistland creature has it become?

$Arno$
The Goddess's dream spells the fate of this world, and we are the readers of her dream.
Others call us the Prophet and revere us.
My abilitites to read the Goddess's dreams is exceptionally strong and I have rose to become the leader of my people.

$Arno$
But why are the dreams I see so sad and full of tragedy?
How many of the Goddess's dreams were happy ones?
What kind of happiness does the Goddess hope for?

$Arno$
We have been supporting this world as the Prophets, and we know very well that there's more to this world than its sad and dark side.
There is hope, and hope is what keeps this world sustains this world. But... does the Goddess not trust her own hopes?

$Arno${sound:npc_Arno_9416_qu_01.ogg}
…Right. I should believe in the one thing that I saw in my dream.
I will meet her someday.

$Silver-haired Woman$
(She silently watches Arno.)

$Arno${sound:npc_Arno_9416_qu_02.ogg}
Welcome.

$Silver-haired Woman${sound:npc_Argenta_9416_qu_04.ogg}
Do you know me?

$Arno${sound:npc_Arno_9416_qu_03.ogg}
Of course. You are the Silver Dragon, one of the fragments of the Ancient Dragon.

$Silver-haired Woman${sound:npc_Argenta_9416_qu_05.ogg}
Hmm... are you one of those creatures who can see the Goddess's dreams?
Why are you here? I am busy. I need to go and kill the corrupted monsters.

$Arno$
Corrupted monsters? Please let us help too.

$Silver-haired Woman$
You? You'll only be a nuissance. The poison of corruption is powerful enough to make a dragon go mad.
I heard it was your ancestors who let the poison enter this world in the first place. Be careful not to end up like them.

$Arno$
...I see.

$Silver-haired Woman$
I was born with the mission to protect this world.
That's the only reason why I exist... so our paths will not cross, Reader of Dreams.

$Arno$
My dear Silver Dragon, that's not what I think. The reason why we can see the Goddess's dreams must be because we have a responsibility to rule and take care of this world. Our ancestors have already sinned and this is the path we should take... So I believe we will meet again. May I ask for your name?

$Silver-haired Woman${sound:npc_Argenta_9416_qu_06.ogg}
My name? I don't have one.

$Arno${sound:npc_Arno_9416_qu_04.ogg}
You... don't have a name?

$Silver-haired Woman${sound:npc_Argenta_9416_qu_07.ogg}
Hmm... I guess humans recognize one another using names.
It would be useful to have one. Give me a nice name.

$Arno$
You want me to name you?
(Arno looks suprised)

$Silver-haired Woman$
You don't expect me to name myself, do you? I'm not familiar with those things.
Just give me a suitable one.

$Arno${sound:npc_Arno_9416_qu_05.ogg}
Hmm... then...
(Arno thinks for a name)

$Arno$
...(Arno is still thinking)

$Arno$
...(Arno continues to think)

$Arno${sound:npc_Arno_9416_qu_06.ogg}
(Arno thinks deeper and deeper...)

$Arno$
...(Arno's train of thought enters the deep abyss)

$Silver-haired Woman${sound:npc_Argenta_9416_qu_08.ogg}
Are you sleeping?! Don't make me stand here all day!
(Argenta seems irritated)

$Arno${sound:npc_Arno_9416_qu_07.ogg}
...N-no I'm still awake. How about the name... Argenta?

$Silver-haired Woman${sound:npc_Argenta_9416_qu_09.ogg}
Argenta...?

$Arno${action:Talk}
That was my great-grandmother's name. It means strongest, wisest one.
I am also named after her.

$Silver-haired Woman${sound:npc_Argenta_9416_qu_10.ogg}
Argenta... Sounds not bad. Okay, call me Argenta from now on. See you again or never, whatever. What's your name, human?

$Arno$
My name is Bishas Arnobius. Everyone calls me Arno for short.

$Argenta$
Alright, Arno. I'll see you around. Be careful of the poison of corruption.
No one in this world can stand that poison.
Well, you should already know better.

$Arno$
Is Goddess Vestinel's poison really that strong?

$Argenta$
It's a poison made by a goddess. It's pure darkness that can never be completely cured.
Even Goddess Altea can't wake up after drinking the poison, what would it do to us?

$Arno$
...I see.

$Argenta$
But since the poison didn't kill her but only made her fall into a deep sleep,
There still is hope for us.

$Arno$
Ah Argenta, you are wise!
You are right. There still is hope for us. You really are the fragment of the great Ancient Dragon.

$Argenta$
Hey, let me make it clear that I don't have any memories of the Ancient Dragon.
If I had the same memory as he had, we'd be having a much more meaningful conversation now.
...well I can't say that for sure too since I've never met him.

$Argenta$
Besides, I was just born so don't expect me to be a sage. You should know more than I do.
Actually, I don't even know what I'm talking about right now.
For goodness sake, I was just born. Why do I need to talk to the leader of humans now?
(Argenta looks a little tired)

$Arno$
It was a fruitful conversation.
Talking to you alone allowed me to see how wise and strong you are.

$Argenta$
Hahaha! That's funny.
Is that what the humans call "bootlicking"?

$Arno${action:Talk}
No, I mean every word.

$Argenta$
Huhu. Humans are quite interesting.
I like you. No wonder we can transform into these little bodies.
Alright, Arno. See you again next time.

$Arno$
Please take care Argenta. I'll see you again when you've returned after you've completed your mission.

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9416_qu_11.ogg}
Complete my mission? Haha... That will never happen.
My mission is to protect this world, and it will never end until I disappear from this world...

$Argenta$
But... I think I understand what you mean.
(Argenta smiles softly.)
You take care too.

$Arno$
Thank you. Please be safe.

$Arno${sound:npc_Arno_9416_qu_08.ogg}
The Silver Dragon... her noble mission truly befits the magnificence of a dragon.
Sadly, we will never be able to become like her.

$Argenta$
Arno was the first person I met in this world and he even gave me a name.
He was so sincere and polite, who wouldn't have trusted him?
Especially so for a little girl who was just born.

$Argenta$
...I never could have guessed he'd be such a creature...
(She looks up at the sky as if she is choking with emotions)

$Argenta$
...corruption, discrimination, contempt, murder, madness, ignorance, irresponsibility... Even if all the poison in this world were scraped together, it wouldn't be able to create a monster like him. I never expected such an evil creature would exist...

$Argenta$
...little spirit, when you grow up and become useful, the humans will come and get you.
Don't get caught by them. Don't get near them and be disappointed in the end...

${user_nick}$
(Argenta walks away. She looks so forlorn...)

$Arno$
...Argenta! Argenta!
Ah... I thought she was here a while ago. Did I miss her...?

$Arno$
...are you a spirit? Or a creature who failed to become one?
It must be you whom Argenta was talking to earlier...

$Arno${action:Sad}
What did she say? What does she think of us? Was she disappointed? Resentful? Does she... hate us? I guess it must be all of those.
It pains me more because I don't know what she's going through.

${user_nick}$
(Arno...)

$Arno$
We should have been eaten by the Black Dragon that we created. That would have served us right. How funny, what we considered as lucky at the time was actually the beginning of misfortune... Yeah, if we disappeared, maybe the dragon would have come to its senses and saved the world!!

${user_nick}$
(Dragon...?)

$Arno$
Ah... regrets are never ending. I didn't know corruption would make you commit so many sins... and I... I was the closest one to the Goddess. Yet, I...

$Arno$
No, this is not the time for me to drown in guilt. I must hurry... before anyone finds out about my plan. We must pay the price of our sins. We must save the world before it goes mad completely!!!

$Arno$
The Monolith will close! Hehehe...
(He sounds like he's laughing and sobbing at the same time)

$Arno$
There is only one way I can live up to Argenta's expectations and save everyone...
Hahahaha....

$Arno$
Hahaha.... Hahahaha....!

${user_nick}$
(Arno's laughter sends a shiver down your spine.)

${user_nick}$
(What's Arno planning to do?)

${user_nick}$
(...the light from the slate is pointing to...)
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

${user_nick}$
(...! The Flame Canyon!)
